page.title: 12Project Countryside
page.content: A large variety of countyside activities are organised for children aged 8-12 years at Waseley Hills Country Park on nine different days throughout the six week summer vacation. Activities include: pond-dipping, country walks, farm visits, camping skills, conservation tasks, conservation games, butterfly survey, flower surveys, bird watching, nest box making, quizzes, tracking, donkey rides, arts and craftwork and organised games. Visits by the Fire Brigade and the Police are arranged and films shown. Adults volunteers ensure that the children are well looked after. A very good day is had by all, and it costs only 20p.
